name: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: A classic Italian pasta dish made with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and pepper. Simple, creamy, and satisfying.

description: Tender chunks of chicken marinated in spices and yogurt, grilled, and served in a creamy tomato curry sauce.

name: Chocolate Lava Cake
description: A decadent dessert with a warm, gooey chocolate center that flows out when cut.
